script.name: wwsl.T2.globalmenu
script.sourceplaintext:
$T2.PageID=8370 $T2.Config=get global variable: name='wwsl.T2.global' $Result=null ifis datatype[ $fn ] == DATATYPE_STRING gosub CallFunction else if not$T2.Config[3] $T2.Config[3] = [TRUE] gosub Menu.Main $T2.Config[3] = [FALSE] end return $Result
* Local function call. * Function name specified in $fn variable. * Functions and argument: * * fn - AddInactiveShips, arg1 - target menu instance * * fn - AddShips, arg1 - target menu instance, arg2 - array of ships * * Option.GroupBySector -> Menu.Option.GroupBySector call * In: $arg1 -> $Menu * In: $arg2 -> $Objects * In: $arg3 -> $SectorAsOption * * SelectWare -> Menu.SelectWare * In: $arg1 -> $MainTypes * In: $arg2 -> $WaresExcluded * In: $arg3 -> $IncludeHardware * Out: $Ware * * SelectWare.OfMainType -> Menu.SelectWare.OfMainType * In: $arg1 -> $MainType * In: $arg2 -> $WaresExcluded * In: $arg3 -> $IncludeHardware * Out: $Ware * * In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config * In: $fn * In: $arg * In: $arg2 * In: $arg3 CallFunction: if$fn == 'AddInactiveShips' $Menu=$arg1 gosub Menu.AddInactiveShips else if$fn == 'AddShips' $Menu=$arg1 $Dummy.DataValues=$arg2 gosub Menu.AddShips else if$fn == 'Option.GroupBySector' $Menu=$arg1 $Objects=$arg2 $SectorAsOption=$arg3 gosub Menu.Option.GroupBySector else if$fn == 'SelectWare' $MainTypes=$arg1 $WaresExcluded=$arg2 $IncludeHardware=$arg3 gosub Menu.SelectWare $Result=$Ware else if$fn == 'SelectWare.OfMainType' $MainType=$arg1 $WaresExcluded=$arg2 $IncludeHardware=$arg3 gosub Menu.SelectWare.OfMainType $Result=$Ware end endsub * End of CallFunction
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $MainTypes - Array of included maintypes. * In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude. * In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades * Out: $Ware - Selected ware or null in none selected. Menu.SelectWare: $Ware=null $MSW.Index=size of array $MainTypes skip if$MSW.Index endsub $MSW.MainTypes=reverse array $MainTypes $Base.TextID=34000 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading $MWS.NumberWares=0 while$MSW.Index dec $MSW.Index= $MainType=$MSW.MainTypes[$MSW.Index] gosub GetWaresOfMainType $MSW.Number=size of array $Wares if$MSW.Number $MWS.NumberWares=$MWS.NumberWares + $MSW.Number $Dummy=2000 + $MainType $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=$Dummy $Dummy=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=147, $Dummy, $MSW.Number, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue=$MainType end end skip if$MWS.NumberWares endsub gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption if$SelectedOption == -1 endsub else $MainType=$SelectedOption gosub Menu.SelectWare.OfMainType end endsub * End of Menu.SelectWare
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $MainType - Main type ID of wares to select to. * In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude. * In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades * Out: $Ware - Selected ware or null in none selected. Menu.SelectWare.OfMainType: $Ware=null $Base.TextID=34200 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading gosub GetWaresOfMainType $Dummy=sort array $Wares $Wares=reverse array $Dummy $MSW.Index=size of array $Wares while$MSW.Index > 0 dec $MSW.Index= $Dummy=$Wares[$MSW.Index] add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue=$Dummy end gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption if$SelectedOption == -1 endsub else $Ware=$SelectedOption end endsub * End of Menu.SelectWare.OfMainType
* Get array of wares of specified maintype. Only known wares will be included. * The wares specified as excluded will not be added. * In: $MainType - Main type ID of wares to select to. * In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude. * In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades * Out: $Wares GetWaresOfMainType: $Wares=array alloc: size=0 $GWOMT.Index=get number of subtypes of maintype $MainType while$GWOMT.Index > 0 dec $GWOMT.Index= $GWOMT.Ware=get ware from maintype $MainType and subtype $GWOMT.Index skip if$GWOMT.Ware continue skip ifhas $GWOMT.Ware been discovered continue do if find $GWOMT.Ware in array: $WaresExcluded continue ifis equipment: ware=$GWOMT.Ware skip if1 & $IncludeHardware continue else ifis upgrade: ware=$GWOMT.Ware skip if2 & $IncludeHardware continue end append $GWOMT.Ware to array $Wares end endsub * End of GetWaresOfMainType
* Build menu options based on array of objects. * Group options by sectors with optional selectable/non-selectable option for * each sector. * In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu - Target menu instance. * In: $Object - Array of objects. * In: $SectorAsOption - true/false. If true, then group (sector) will be * with sector object as return value. Menu.Option.GroupBySector: $Dummy.DataValues=array alloc: size=0 $Dummy.SortValues=array alloc: size=0 $Dummy.Index=size of array $Objects while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$Objects[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy.Sector=$Dummy -> get sector $Dummy2.Index=get index of $Dummy.Sector in array $Dummy.SortValues offset=-1 + 1 if$Dummy2.Index == -1 $Dummy2=create new array, arguments=$Dummy, null, null, null, null append $Dummy2 to array $Dummy.DataValues append $Dummy.Sector to array $Dummy.SortValues else $Dummy2=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy2.Index] append $Dummy to array $Dummy2 end end $Dummy=sort array: data=$Dummy.DataValues sort values=$Dummy.SortValues $DataValues=reverse array $Dummy $Dummy=sort array $Dummy.SortValues $SortValues=reverse array $Dummy $Dummy.Index=size of array $DataValues while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy.Sector=$SortValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy.DataValues=$DataValues[$Dummy.Index] gosub Menu.Option.GroupBySector.Sub2 end endsub * End of Menu.Option.GroupBySector
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu * In: $Dummy.Sector * In: $Dummy.DataValues * In: $SectorAsOption Menu.Option.GroupBySector.Sub2: $Dummy2.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues if$Dummy2.Index == 1 $Dummy=$Dummy.DataValues[0] $Dummy2=$Dummy -> get name $Dummy3=$Dummy -> get ID code $Dummy2=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=29106, $Dummy.Sector, $Dummy2, $Dummy3, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy2 returnvalue=$Dummy endsub end $Dummy2=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=29104, $Dummy.Sector, null, null, null, null $Dummy3=0 do if $SectorAsOption $Dummy3=$Dummy.Sector add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy2 returnvalue=$Dummy3 $Dummy=sort array $Dummy.DataValues $Dummy.DataValues=reverse array $Dummy $Dummy2.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues while$Dummy2.Index > 0 dec $Dummy2.Index= $Dummy=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy2.Index] $Dummy2=$Dummy -> get name $Dummy3=$Dummy -> get ID code $Dummy2=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=29105, $Dummy2, $Dummy3, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy2 returnvalue=$Dummy end endsub * End of Menu.Option.GroupBySector.Sub2
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config * In: $Menu Menu.Option.Groups: $Dummy.DataValues=$T2.Config[2][1] $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues $DataValues=array alloc: size=0 $SortValues=array alloc: size=0 $TextValues=array alloc: size=0 while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Object=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy=$Object -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.config' $Dummy=$Dummy[9] $Dummy=size of array $Dummy $Object.Text=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=4200, $Object, $Dummy, null, null, null append $Object.Text to array $SortValues gosub ApplyColoring append $Object.Text to array $TextValues do if $Object -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.menu.opened' $Object=0 append $Object to array $DataValues end gosub Menu.AddOptions endsub * End of Menu.Option.Groups
* Append option to menu: AllTransports * In: $Menu * In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.Option.AllTransports: $DataValues=$T2.Config[2][0] $Dummy.Index=size of array $DataValues $Dummy=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=4102, $Dummy.Index, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='AllTransports' endsub * End of Menu.Option.AllTransports
* Add menu heading base of $Base.TextID * In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu * In: $Base.TextID Menu.Option.Heading: $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=$Base.TextID add custom menu heading to array $Menu: title=$Dummy endsub * End of Menu.Option.Heading
* Add menu exit option * In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu Menu.Option.Exit: $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=111 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue=-1 endsub * End of Menu.Option.Exit
* Add menu info line base on $Base.TextID + 1 * In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu * In: $Base.TextID Menu.Option.InfoLine: $Dummy=$Base.TextID + 1 $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=$Dummy add custom menu info line to array $Menu: text=$Dummy endsub * End of Menu.Option.InfoLine
* Open menu with title based on $Base.TextID + 2 * In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config * In: $Menu * In: $Base.TextID * Out: $SelectedOption Menu.GetSelectedOption: $Dummy=$Base.TextID + 2 $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=$Dummy $Dummy2=$T2.Config[0] $Dummy2=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=467, $Dummy2, null, null, null, null $SelectedOption=open custom menu: title=$Dummy description=$Dummy2 option array=$Menu endsub * End of Menu.GetSelectedOption
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.Main: $Base.TextID=4000 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=4101 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='SingleTransports' gosub Menu.Option.Groups $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=4104 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='CreateGroup' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=4103 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='AddTransport' gosub Menu.Option.AllTransports gosub Menu.Option.NameFilters $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=4105 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='GlobalSettings' gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption if$SelectedOption == -1 endsub else if$SelectedOption == 'AllTransports' gosub Menu.AllTransports else if$SelectedOption == 'SingleTransports' gosub Menu.SingleTransports else if$SelectedOption == 'GlobalSettings' gosub Menu.GlobalSettings else if$SelectedOption == 'AddTransport' gosub Menu.AddTransport else if$SelectedOption == 'CreateGroup' gosub Menu.CreateGroup else if$SelectedOption == 'SetupNameFilters' gosub Menu.SetupNameFilters else @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.shipmenu : end goto label Menu.Main * End of Menu.Main
* Append option to menu: SetupNameFilters * In: $Menu * In: $T2.PageID Menu.Option.NameFilters: $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=4100 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='SetupNameFilters' endsub * End of Menu.Option.NameFilters
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.SingleTransports: $Base.TextID=5000 $Menu=create custom menu array $DataValues=$T2.Config[2][0] $Dummy.Index=size of array $DataValues $Dummy.DataValues=array alloc: size=0 while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$DataValues[$Dummy.Index] @ do if $Dummy -> call script wwsl.T2.function0 : #Fn=513 continue append $Dummy to array $Dummy.DataValues end $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues $Dummy=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=$Base.TextID, $Dummy.Index, null, null, null, null add custom menu heading to array $Menu: title=$Dummy gosub Menu.AddShips do if size of array $DataValues gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption if$SelectedOption == -1 endsub else @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.shipmenu : end goto label Menu.SingleTransports * End of Menu.SingleTransports
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.AllTransports: $Base.TextID=6000 $Menu=create custom menu array $Dummy.DataValues=$T2.Config[2][0] $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues $Dummy=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=$Base.TextID, $Dummy.Index, null, null, null, null add custom menu heading to array $Menu: title=$Dummy gosub Menu.AddShips do if size of array $DataValues gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption if$SelectedOption == -1 endsub else @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.shipmenu : end goto label Menu.AllTransports * End of Menu.AllTransports
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu * In: $Dummy.DataValues * Out: $DataValues * Out: $TextValues * Out: $SortValues Menu.AddShips: $DataValues=array alloc: size=0 $SortValues=array alloc: size=0 $TextValues=array alloc: size=0 $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Object=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy=$Object -> get ID code $Object.Text=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=532, $Object, $Dummy, null, null, null append $Object.Text to array $SortValues gosub ApplyColoring append $Object.Text to array $TextValues do if $Object -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.menu.opened' $Object=0 append $Object to array $DataValues end gosub Menu.AddOptions endsub * End of Menu.AddShips
* Apply color scheme to text representation of object. * In: $T2.PageID * In: $Object * In: $Object.Text - text representation of object (to coloring) * Out: $Object.Text - colored text ApplyColoring: if$Object -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.menu.opened' $Object.Text=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=684, $Object.Text, null, null, null, null endsub end if not$Object -> is script wwsl.T2.run on stack of task=0 $Object.Text=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=680, $Object.Text, null, null, null, null endsub end $Dummy=$Object -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.config' $Dummy=$Dummy[4] if$Dummy == 1 $Object.Text=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=685, $Object.Text, null, null, null, null else if$Dummy == 2 $Object.Text=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=686, $Object.Text, null, null, null, null end endsub * End of ApplyColoring
* Add menu options. * In: $Menu * In: $DataValues - menu return options (unsorted) * In: $TextValues - menu entry texts (same order with $DataValues) * In: $SortValues Menu.AddOptions: $Dummy=sort array: data=$DataValues sort values=$SortValues $Dummy.DataValues=reverse array $Dummy $Dummy=sort array: data=$TextValues sort values=$SortValues $Dummy.TextValues=reverse array $Dummy $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$Dummy.TextValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy2=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy.Index] add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue=$Dummy2 end endsub * End of Menu.AddOptions
* Add menu separator. * In: $Menu Menu.AddSeparator: $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=518 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue=0 endsub * End of Menu.AddSeparator
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.GlobalSettings: $Base.TextID=3000 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3009 $RightColumnOffset=string $Dummy to integer $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3000 add custom menu heading to array $Menu: title=$Dummy $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3010 $Dummy2=$T2.Config[6] $Dummy2=convert number $Dummy2 to string $Dummy=create new array, arguments=0, $Dummy, $RightColumnOffset, $Dummy2, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='LastShipNumber' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3100 $Dummy2=$T2.Config[7] $Dummy2=convert number $Dummy2 to string $Dummy=create new array, arguments=0, $Dummy, $RightColumnOffset, $Dummy2, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='RotateLog.Days' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3104 $Dummy2=$T2.Config[8] $Dummy2=format time: $Dummy2 $Dummy=create new array, arguments=0, $Dummy, $RightColumnOffset, $Dummy2, null add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='RotateLog.LastTime' * Make options with value selection $Dummy.Flags=$T2.Config[4] $DataValues=array alloc: size=0 $Dummy=create new array, arguments=4, 3101, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues $Dummy=create new array, arguments=1, 3102, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues * Enable/Disable trading messages $Dummy=create new array, arguments=8, 3105, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues * Enable/Disable combat messages $Dummy=create new array, arguments=128, 3203, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues $Dummy=create new array, arguments=32, 3108, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues * Enable/Disable install/upgrade logging $Dummy=create new array, arguments=2, 3103, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues $Dummy=create new array, arguments=16, 3107, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues $Dummy=create new array, arguments=64, 3109, null, null, null append $Dummy to array $DataValues $Count=size of array $DataValues $Index=0 while$Index < $Count $Dummy.Args=$DataValues[$Index] gosub Menu.AddBooleanSelection.0 inc $Index= end $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3106 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='DisableLogging.AllShips' gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption do if $SelectedOption == -1 endsub $Count=size of array $DataValues $Index=0 while$Index < $Count $Dummy.Mask=$DataValues[$Index][0] inc $Index= $Dummy.Flags=$Dummy.Flags | $Dummy.Mask skip if$SelectedOption[$Index][1] $Dummy.Flags=$Dummy.Flags ^ $Dummy.Mask end $T2.Config[4] = $Dummy.Flags $SelectedOption=$SelectedOption[0] if$SelectedOption == -1 endsub else if$SelectedOption == 'LastShipNumber' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3201 $Dummy=[THIS] -> get user input: type=Перем/Число, title=$Dummy ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT skip if$Dummy >= 0 $Dummy=0 $T2.Config[6] = $Dummy end else if$SelectedOption == 'RotateLog.Days' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3202 $Dummy=[THIS] -> get user input: type=Перем/Число, title=$Dummy ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT skip if$Dummy >= 1 AND $Dummy <= 30 $Dummy=1 $T2.Config[7] = $Dummy end else if$SelectedOption == 'RotateLog.LastTime' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=3200 $Dummy=[THIS] -> get user input: type=Перем/Число, title=$Dummy ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT skip if$Dummy >= 0 $Dummy=0 $T2.Config[8] = $Dummy end else if$SelectedOption == 'DisableLogging.AllShips' $Dummy.DataValues= get ship array: of race Player class/type=Корабль $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy=$Dummy -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.config' ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $Dummy2=$Dummy[2] $Dummy2=( $Dummy2 | 1 ) ^ 1 $Dummy[2] = $Dummy2 end end end goto label Menu.GlobalSettings * End of Menu.GlobalSettings
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.SetupNameFilters: $Base.TextID=7000 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=7100 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue='AddFilter' gosub Menu.AddSeparator $DataValues=$T2.Config[5] $Dummy.Index=size of array $DataValues while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$DataValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy=sprintf: pageid=$T2.PageID textid=7101, $Dummy, null, null, null, null $Dummy2=$Dummy.Index + 1 add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Dummy returnvalue=$Dummy2 end do if size of array $DataValues gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption do if $SelectedOption == -1 endsub if$SelectedOption == 'AddFilter' $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=7200 $Dummy=[THIS] -> get user input: type=Текст, title=$Dummy ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_STRING skip iffind $Dummy in array: $DataValues append $Dummy to array $DataValues end else dec $SelectedOption= remove element from array $DataValues at index $SelectedOption end goto label Menu.SetupNameFilters * End of Menu.SetupNameFilters
* Add inactive ships to menu as options (available for new job) * In: $T2.Config * In: $T2.PageID * In: $Menu Menu.AddInactiveShips: $Objects=array alloc: size=0 $DataValues2= get ship array: of race Player class/type=Подвижный корабль $Index2=size of array $DataValues2 while$Index2 > 0 dec $Index2= $Dummy=$DataValues2[$Index2] do if $Dummy == [THIS] continue do if $Dummy -> is task 0 in use continue gosub Test.DummyNameFiltered do if $IsFiltered continue $Dummy2=$Dummy -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.config' if$Dummy2 $Dummy2=$Dummy2[1] * Skip only Chiefs do if $Dummy2 == 1 continue end append $Dummy to array $Objects end $SectorAsOption=[FALSE] gosub Menu.Option.GroupBySector endsub * End of Menu.AddInactiveShips
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.AddTransport: $Base.TextID=8000 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading gosub Menu.AddInactiveShips do if size of array $DataValues gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption do if $SelectedOption == -1 endsub @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=510 arg1=0 @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.shipmenu : if not$SelectedOption -> is task 0 in use $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=8200 do if [THIS] -> get user input: type=Var/Boolean, title=$Dummy $SelectedOption ->start task 0 with script wwsl.T2.run and prio 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null end endsub * End of Menu.AddTransport
* In: $T2.PageID * In: $T2.Config Menu.CreateGroup: $Base.TextID=9000 $Menu=create custom menu array gosub Menu.Option.Heading gosub Menu.AddInactiveShips do if size of array $DataValues gosub Menu.AddSeparator gosub Menu.Option.Exit gosub Menu.Option.InfoLine gosub Menu.GetSelectedOption do if $SelectedOption == -1 endsub @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.function1 : #Fn=510 arg1=1 @ =$SelectedOption -> call script wwsl.T2.shipmenu : if not$SelectedOption -> is task 0 in use $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=9200 do if [THIS] -> get user input: type=Var/Boolean, title=$Dummy $SelectedOption ->start task 0 with script wwsl.T2.run and prio 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null end endsub * End of Menu.CreateGroup
* In: $Menu * In: $Dummy.Flags * In: $Dummy.Args array of (bit mask, text id) Menu.AddBooleanSelection.0: $Dummy.Index=$Dummy.Args[1] $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=$Dummy.Index $Dummy.DataValues=read text: page id=$T2.PageID, from 3198 to 3199 to array, include empty=0 $Dummy.Mask=$Dummy.Args[0] $Dummy2=$Dummy.Mask & $Dummy.Flags do if $Dummy2 $Dummy2=1 add value selection to menu: $Menu, text=$Dummy, value array=$Dummy.DataValues, default=$Dummy2, return id=null endsub
* In: $T2.Config * In: $Dummy * Out: $IsFiltered Test.DummyNameFiltered: $IsFiltered=[FALSE] $Dummy.Name=$Dummy -> get name $Dummy.DataValues=$T2.Config[5] $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.DataValues while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy2=$Dummy.DataValues[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy3=find position of pattern $Dummy2 in $Dummy.Name if$Dummy3 == 0 $IsFiltered=[TRUE] endsub end end endsub * End of Test.DummyNameFiltered
return null

comment.var: fn - AddInactiveShips, arg1 - target menu instance
fn - AddShips, arg1 - target menu instance, arg2 - array of ships
In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude.
In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades
Out: $Ware - Selected ware or null in none selected.

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: In: $MainType - Main type ID of wares to select to.
In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude.
In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades
Out: $Ware - Selected ware or null in none selected.

line.text: add custom menu item to array

comment.var: Get array of wares of specified maintype. Only known wares will be included.
The wares specified as excluded will not be added.
In: $MainType - Main type ID of wares to select to.
In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude.
In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades

line.text: get number of subtypes of maintype

comment.var: Build menu options based on array of objects.

comment.var: Add inactive ships to menu as options (available for new job)
In: $Dummy.Args array of (bit mask, text id)

sval.val: fn - AddInactiveShips, arg1 - target menu instance
fn - AddShips, arg1 - target menu instance, arg2 - array of ships
In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude.
In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades
Out: $Ware - Selected ware or null in none selected.
In: $MainType - Main type ID of wares to select to.
In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude.
In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades
Out: $Ware - Selected ware or null in none selected.
Get array of wares of specified maintype. Only known wares will be included.
The wares specified as excluded will not be added.
In: $MainType - Main type ID of wares to select to.
In: $WaresExcluded - Array of wares to exclude.
In: $IncludeHardware - Bitcode to include: 1 - equipment, 2 - upgrades
